name: (C) ESTAR HP Pt. FS (Other Fossil Furnace)
_description: ENERGY STAR air source heat pump (w/ cold climates specs as applicable) w/ original distillate furnace backup

notes: Split system ducted (see Tables 2 (warm climates) and 3 (cold climates) in EPA source)
conversion from original standard: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source)
split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

source_data.title: ENERGY STAR Program Requirements Product Specification for Central Air Conditioner and Heat Pump Equipment Version 6.1
source_data.author: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency

source_data.title: Draft PDS:01, MINHERS Addendum 71, SEER2/HSPF2 Conversions
source_data.author: RESNET

source_data.title: Residential Demand Module of the National Energy Modeling System: Model Documentation 2014
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

notes: Uses residential system costs and normalizes by typical capacity of residential systems (36 kBtu/h)
Retail (new) and total installed (existing) cost for ENERGY STAR ASHPs in 2023

For existing buildings, additional tank removal costs of 800 2014$ (975 2022$) are applied for distillate and propane based on the 2015 EIA report, updating the cost from April 2014 to April 2022. No additional electrical infrastructure costs assumed for dual fuel residential measures.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of the ENERGY STAR range

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

notes: Heating multiple of 21% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane furnace (961852 sf) by square feet in switch main heating equipment is oil or propane furnace or packaged unit (4543002 sf)

cooling multiple of 37% was determined by dividing square feet in which cooling equipment is residential split system or individual AC unit AND heating equipment is not natural gas or electric (13428155 sf) by square feet with same cooling constraint and heating across all fossil fuel types (36556957 sf). Ventilation multiples determined by square feet in which given ventilation system (VAV or CAV) is paired with given heating system for the measure.
